subject: Simsonn Pedal Comparison
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,
i've recently stumbeled upon your pedals and i have a question about them.
What exactly is the difference between the pro x and the plus x pedals.
I've seen the obvious things like the damper on the brake padel and the RGB
lights, but i was wondering if there are other differences or if it's just
these things.
Thank you for your answer

conversations.body_text: Hi Chrisi 31,  PlusX features 12-bit resolution, while ProX Ultra uses 16-bit resolution. ProX Ultra also supports 8 levels of hydraulic adjustment. For ADC sampling, ProX Ultra performs simultaneous (parallel) acquisition of all three pedals, whereas PlusX uses a polling-based sampling method.Â
